field.name: VSTB
field.description: USB Regulator standby in run/wait modes\n This bit controls whether the USB VREG enters standby in VLPW and VLPR modes

field.name: SSTB
field.description: USB Regulator standby in stop modes\n This bit controls whether the USB VREG enters standby in STOP, VLPS, LLS and VLLS modes

field.name: RWE
field.description: USB Voltage Regulator write enable\n Writing 1 to this bit allows the REGE bit in the SOPT1 register to be written.\n This bit clears after a write to the REGE bit

field.name: UVSWE
field.description: USB Standby write enable\n Writing 1 to this bit allows the SSTB and VSTB bits in the SOPT1 register to be written.\n This bit clears after a write to SSTB, VSTB or both

field.name: VLLDBGREQ
field.description: Very Low Leakage Debug Request upon Wakeup\n This bit can be written through the BDM interface

field.name: WAITE
field.description: Wait mode enable\n Enables entry to WAIT mode

field.name: STOPE
field.description: Stop mode enable\n Enables entry to stop mode.\n This bit can be written only once after each reset

field.name: MTBASE1
field.description: UART1 TX modulation time base select

field.name: MBSL
field.description: Mini-FlexBus security level\n When flash security is enabled this field affects what CPU operations can access off-chip via the Mini-FlexBus

field.name: I2CDR0
field.description: I2C Link for I2C0 and I2C1\n Allows I2C0 & I2C1 signals to be internally inter-connected

field.name: I2CDR2
field.description: I2C Link for I2C2 and I2C3\n Allows I2C2 & I2C3 to be internally inter-connected

field.name: ACFTM
field.description: CMP output connection to FTM0 Ch0\n Allows the CMP output to be internally connected to FTM0.CH0

field.name: USBBE
field.description:
USB Byte-swap Enable
 Enables byte swapping for all USB master accesses
 Byte swapping affects all USB read data, USB write data, and USB BD accesses.
 This enable bit should only be written when the USB is disabled

register.name: COPC
register.description: COP Control Register\n All of the bits in this register can be written only once after a reset

field.name: COPCLKS
field.description: COP watchdog clock select\n This write-once bit selects the clock source of the COP watchdog

field.name: COPT
field.description: COP watchdog timeout\n These write-once bits select the timeout period of the COP.\n The COPT field along with the COPCLKS bit define the COP timeout period

register.name: SRVCOP
register.description: Service COP Register\n Write 0x55 followed by 0xAA to service COP

field.name: OSC1EREFS
field.description: External reference select\n Selects the source for the external reference clock

field.name: OSC1HGO
field.description: High gain oscillator select\n Controls the crystal oscillator mode of operation

field.name: OSC1RANGE
field.description: Frequency range select\n Selects the frequency range for the crystal oscillator or external clock source

field.name: OUTDIV
field.description: Clock output divider value to generate CPU clock\n Sets the divide value for the core/system clock

register.name: CLKDIV1
register.description: Clock Divider 1 Register\n This register sets the clock divider when the USB clock source is MCGFLLCLK/MCGPLLCLK (SOPT2[USBSRC]).\n Output clock = Input clock x [ (USBFRAC+1) / (USBDIV+1) ]

field.name: USBFRAC
field.description: USB clock divider fraction\n Sets the fraction multiply value for the fractional clock divider used as a source for USB clock

field.name: USBDIV
field.description: USB clock divider divisor\n Sets the divide value for the fractional clock divider used as a source for the USB clock
